title: FanDuel Co-Founder Has a New Fix for Bettors
itunes:title: FanDuel Co-Founder Has a New Fix for Bettors
description:
Sports betting is back in the headlines after a trio of states voted in favor of ballot measures aimed at legalizing gaming initiatives. Jason Kelly, Michael Barr, and Mike Lynch speak with Nigel Eccles, co-founder & CEO of sports app, Flick, and co-founder and former CEO of fantasy sports and betting platform FanDuel, about the gaming industry, and the path forward for his new sports chat platform, Flick. The app has drawn investments from several top-tier venture capital firms. They discuss Flick's deal with BetMGM in the U.S., the transformation of fan engagement during the pandemic, and why Flick is targeting sports influencers for the platform. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
